title: The Invisible handicap: dyslexia
brief_description: Introduces basic concepts about the learning disability of dyslexia. Shows candid scenes of dyslexic children and includes the comments of a college engineering student whose first-grade reading ability due to dyslexia has hindered, but not stopped her education.
